mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOC_USER ( ID, PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_TEL, REGDATE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, PASSWORD AS password, USER_NAME AS userName, USER_TEL AS userTel, REGDATE AS regDate, REGNO AS regNo FROM DOC_USER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
